about_the_game:
Your name is Tyler, your father is a human, but your mother is an alien snake and also the queen of the aliens. Everything was peaceful between aliens and humans until your mother was betrayed and murdered. Under new leadership, aliens started to attack earth, and cities were all evacuated. You are the only one who can stop the aliens, because you are half alien. Good luck, the world is in your hands now.

Compelling Features


  • Zombie-survival-style core gameplay loop
  • Enormous open-world city
  • Stylized and beautiful visuals
  • Amazing game feel
  • Ability to turn off blood and gore
detailed_description:
Your name is Tyler, your father is a human, but your mother is an alien snake and also the queen of the aliens. Everything was peaceful between aliens and humans until your mother was betrayed and murdered. Under new leadership, aliens started to attack earth, and cities were all evacuated. You are the only one who can stop the aliens, because you are half alien. Good luck, the world is in your hands now.

Compelling Features


  • Zombie-survival-style core gameplay loop
  • Enormous open-world city
  • Stylized and beautiful visuals
  • Amazing game feel
  • Ability to turn off blood and gore

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or SteamOS Equivalent
  • Processor: Sandy Bridge Intel CPU or Zen AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or AMD RX 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4 or SteamOS Equivalent
  • Processor: Kaby Lake Intel CPU or Zen2 AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Sandy Bridge Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Integrated or Intel Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Apple Silicon Natively
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Kaby Lake Intel CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Integrated or AMD Dedicated
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Apple Silicon Natively

name: Apocalyptic Gash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 64-bit
  • Processor: Sandy Bridge Intel CPU or Zen AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or AMD RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Kaby Lake Intel CPU or Zen2 AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You are the only person on Earth who is capable of defeating aliens, and the entire world is in hiding in despair. Play as half-alien half-human Tyler in this open-world stylized alien shooter game, and fight terrifying spiders and other alienated creatures. It is up to you to stop this apocalypse.
